pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.2: Tena kho pana samayena aññatarena upāsakena saṃghaṃ uddissa vihāro kārāpito hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.3: So tassa vihārassa mahe ubhatosaṃghassa akālacīvaraṃ dātukāmo hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.4: Tena kho pana samayena ubhatosaṃghassa kathinaṃ atthataṃ hoti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.5: Atha kho so upāsako saṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kathinuddhāraṃ yāci.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.7: Atha kho bhagavā etasmiṃ nidāne etasmiṃ pakaraṇe dhammiṃ kathaṃ katvā bhikkhū āmantesi—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.12: Yadi saṃghassa pattakallaṃ, saṃgho kathinaṃ uddhareyya.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.16: Yassāyasmato khamati kathinassa uddhāro, so tuṇhassa;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.1.18: Ubbhataṃ saṃghena kathinaṃ, khamati saṃghassa, tasmā tuṇhī, evametaṃ dhārayāmī’”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.1: Atha kho so upāsako bhikkhunisaṃghaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kathinuddhāraṃ yāci.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.4: Atha kho so upāsako ujjhāyati khiyyati vipāceti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.5: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo amhākaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ na dassantī”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.6: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tassa upāsakassa ujjhāyantassa khiyyantassa vipācentassa.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.7: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.8: “kathañhi nāma ayyā thullanandā dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhissatī”ti …pe…
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.9: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhatī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.12: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, thullanandā bhikkhunī dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāhissati.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.14: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:1.2.15: “Yā pana bhikkhunī dhammikaṃ kathinuddhāraṃ paṭibāheyya, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc30:2.1.8: “kathaṃ idaṃ kathinaṃ na uddhareyyā”ti paṭibāhati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
